name: Secrets in the Desert
description: After meeting with the Cardassians to forward a Federation trade agreement, Captain Jonathan Archer's shuttle is shot down over the desert planet, Dozaria. Help him escape, and learn more about who shot him down and why.
rules:
— Unique Federation, Cardassian, and Section 31 Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
— Using any version of Archer, Tyler, or O'Brien will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
— Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
— In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Archer, Tyler, or O'Brien
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: O'Brien
featured_crew.flavor: Working undercover for Starfleet Intelligence, O'Brien was ordered to investigate the Orion Syndicate.

screens.text: "Captain! I'm glad you're not hurt. I don't know why the Cardassians would shoot us down after you and I just finished that trade deal with them. Something else is going on. Maybe we'll get some answers at that mining camp over there. Stay low, okay? We don't want to be seen."
"Psst! Over here! Aren't you... Miles O'Brien? What are you doing working on a Dozarian mining camp?"
"Yes, Captain, and with me is Ensign Tyler. I'm really glad to see you! We crash landed here some time ago, were found, and made to work in the dilithium mines. I hope you're here to get us out."

"We'll do everything we can to get all of us out. I'll figure out if there's a way to make some sort of rescue beacon, while my friend here tries to find out more about what's going on. I have a feeling it's nothing good. Hang in there, Mr. O'Brien. We got this."
